name: Ghast of Leng
description: The Ghast of Leng is a large, monstrous being with a vicious demeanor and sharp claws, designed for melee combat.
memorable: Its Blood Frenzy ability allows it to strike harder against weakened foes, making it a fearsome opponent in battle.
goals: To overpower and devour weakened enemies, utilizing its combat prowess.
relations: Related to other grotesque aberrations and may serve or lead lesser undead.
environment: Typically found in dark, eerie locations where it can leverage its abilities without sunlight interference.
strengths: Has high Dexterity which enhances evasion; benefits from advantages against weakened foes with Blood Frenzy.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and suffers in sunlight, with disadvantages on attacks and ability checks.
attacks: Powerful melee attacks with claws and bite that deal substantial slashing and piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Frenzy grants it advantage on attack rolls against injured creatures, amplifying its lethality.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 120 feet, although it has a passive perception of only 11.
skills: Has a basic proficiency in perception, allowing it to detect surroundings but not excel in it.
additional_information: Blood Frenzy ability enhances melee attacks against injured foes.
Sunlight hypersensitivity makes it weak in daylight.
Keen Smell enhances its awareness of surroundings.
test_queries: ferocious aberration with a keen sense of smell
